resources.string: " Nelly’s flower shop has been your trusted florist since 1971 serving the New York area. Nelly’s Flower shop prides itself for offering quality, affordable and exquisite flowers for all occasions. \n We are located at 501 Broadway in the heart of South Williamsburg, Brooklyn. Always trying to go the extra mile to accommodate all of our client’s floral needs."
Store Hours: \nEveryDay 9:00am – 7:00pm \nDuring holiday months please call, 718-963-4062 for extended store hours.
